parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Animations

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Elevates periscope of a vehicle. Vehicles in Arma 3 which are compatible with this tech are Strider, remote laser designators, the robot arm on Eddie, etc. Please note that SDV submarine has a different periscope, which is just an animated selection and could be raised and lowered with [[animate]] command. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> User can immediately override any elevation in progress by using assigned keyboard keys. To block user input use <tt>blockuser</tt> param.</value></part></template>
A [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers#PeriscopeElevationChanged | PeriscopeElevationChanged]] entity event handler is also provided.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> vehicle [[elevatePeriscope]] [turret, elevation, speed, blockuser]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle with periscope tech
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [turret, elevation, speed, blockuser]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> turret: [[Array]] - turret on which periscope is located
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> elevation: [[Number]] - elevation range 0...1
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> speed (Optional): [[Number]] or [[Boolean]] - config anim speed multiplier, 2 - twice as fast, 0.5 - twice as slow, etc. -1 - default config speed. If [[true]] is used as param, the change in elevation is almost instant.
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> blockuser (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to disable user ability to control periscope with keyboard. The change is persistent unless you set it to [[false]] again.

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_eddie [[elevatePeriscope]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0], 0.75, 0.1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[periscopeElevation]], [[animate]], [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers#PeriscopeElevationChanged | PeriscopeElevationChanged]]
</value></part></template></root>
